name: Kundim√°n
longDesc: A memory of smoke curling around invisible figures. The scent of a love letter burned before it was sent.
poetry: Opens with the whisper of Ylang Ylang, settling into the warmth of wet earth and ash.

name: Diwata
desc: Green Mango, Coconut Milk, White Musk
longDesc: Bioluminescence flickering in a dark mangrove forest. A sweetness that is dangerous and divine.
poetry: Sharp green mango cuts through the humidity, resting on a bed of milky, spectral musk.

name: Tala
longDesc: Light refracting through deep ocean water. The silence of the shore before the sun rises.
poetry: A piercing citrus light that dissolves into the grey salinity of ancient driftwood.
